title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding. Description: If the key is blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart. Steps to reproduce: 1. [Please provide steps to reproduce the issue.]
OB: When adding a localization key with a blank value, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
EB: In the properties file, when a key is left blank but has a valid value, the externalized text should still be displayed in the chart title.
SR: 1. Set an externalized text in the chart title.
